scripts.build:all: npm run build:es2015 && npm run build:es2020 && npm run build:es2022
scripts.build:es2015: tsc -b && cross-env VITE_ES_TARGET=es2015 vite build && cross-env VITE_ES_TARGET=es2015 node scripts/post-build.js
scripts.build:es2020: tsc -b && cross-env VITE_ES_TARGET=es2020 vite build && cross-env VITE_ES_TARGET=es2020 node scripts/post-build.js
scripts.build:es2022: tsc -b && cross-env VITE_ES_TARGET=es2022 vite build && cross-env VITE_ES_TARGET=es2022 node scripts/post-build.js
scripts.build-and-pdf: npm run build:es2020 && npm run export-pdf-simple
